mod.name: CatGirl Mod
mod.credits:
Contributors: Taxouck. 
Beta Testers: Yun, Graham, The Golden Fairy, Skyson. 
Localization: BDWSSBB, Rucodeby.
mod.description: Adds a new playable catgirl as a character.

cards.name: Stumble
cards.description:
Exhaust on discard.
Clumsy: Deal 6 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Claw Strike
cards.description: Deal 3 damage 2 times.

cards.name: Claw Strike+
cards.description: Deal 5 damage 2 times.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Evasion
cards.description: Gain 4 Evade.

cards.name: Evasion+
cards.description: Gain 8 Evade.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Change Of Plans
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
Put a card from your hand to the top of your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Change Of Plans+
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
Put a card from your hand to the top of your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Claw Scratch
cards.description: Deal 6 damage for each Attack played this turn.

cards.name: Claw Scratch+
cards.description: Deal 8 damage for each Attack played this turn.

cards.name: Claws
cards.description: Deal 7 damage to a random enemy and applies 2 stacks of Gash.

cards.name: Claws+
cards.description: Deal 7 damage to a random enemy and applies 3 stacks of Gash.

cards.name: Clench Your Teeth
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Discard 1 card.

cards.name: Clench Your Teeth+
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.
Discard 1 card.

cards.name: Combo Attack
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Draw a card.
If it is an Attack, play it. Otherwise, discard it.

cards.name: Combo Attack+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Draw a card.
If it is an Attack, play it. Otherwise, discard it.

cards.name: Declining Defenses
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block. Decrease this card's Block by 1 this combat.
Clumsy: Gain 6 Block.

cards.name: Declining Defenses+
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block. Decrease this card's Block by 1 this combat.
Clumsy: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Elegant Strike
cards.description:
Deal 1 damage for each Evade you have.
( 0 Damage).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Elegant Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 1 damage for each Evade you have.
( 0 Damage).

cards.name: Emergency Parry
cards.description: Lose all Evade and gain Block equal to the amount lost.

cards.name: Emergency Parry+
cards.description: Lose all Evade and gain Block equal to 2 times the amount lost.

cards.name: Growl
cards.description: Apply 1 Vulnerable to a random enemy 3 times.

cards.name: Growl+
cards.description: Apply 1 Vulnerable to a random enemy 4 times.

cards.name: Keep Alert
cards.description:
Gain 8 Evade.
Evade is not lost at the end of this turn.

cards.name: Keep Alert+
cards.description:
Gain 8 Evade.
Evade is not lost at the end of this turn.

cards.name: Learn By Mistake
cards.description: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your discard pile.

cards.name: Learn By Mistake+
cards.description: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your discard pile +3.

cards.name: Lost Trinket
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
Exhaust 1 card.

cards.name: Lost Trinket+
cards.description:
Draw 3 cards.
Exhaust 1 card.

cards.name: Lucky Blow
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
If you have discarded a card this turn, this card damage is increased by 6.

cards.name: Lucky Blow+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
If you have discarded a card this turn, this card damage is increased by 8.

cards.name: Meow
cards.description:
Apply 2 Weak to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Meow+
cards.description:
Apply 3 Weak to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Misfire
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Draw 1 card.
Discard 1 card.

cards.name: Misfire+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Draw 1 card.
Discard 1 card.

cards.name: Parry
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Deal 5 damage.
If the enemy intends to attack, gain 4 Evade.

cards.name: Parry+
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Deal 7 damage.
If the enemy intends to attack, gain 6 Evade.

cards.name: Play Around
cards.description: Deal 7 damage and applies 2 stacks of Striken.

cards.name: Play Around+
cards.description: Deal 7 damage and applies 2 stacks of Striken.

cards.name: Poised Strike
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Upgrade a random Skill in your hand for the rest of the combat.

cards.name: Poised Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Upgrade all Skills in your hand for the rest of the combat.

cards.name: Quick Strike
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Quick Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Rage Claws
cards.description: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy 4 times.

cards.name: Rage Claws+
cards.description: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy 5 times.

cards.name: Recovery Blow
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Draw a card for each Stumble on your hand.

cards.name: Recovery Blow+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Draw a card for each Stumble on your hand.

cards.name: Running With Daggers
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
If you have discarded a card this turn,
gain [E] [E].

cards.name: Running With Daggers+
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage.
If you have discarded a card this turn,
gain [E] [E].

cards.name: Search Backpack
cards.description:
Draw 1 cards.
Discard 1 card.

cards.name: Search Backpack+
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
Discard 1 card.

cards.name: Slip
cards.description:
Gain 9 Evade.
Discard 1 card.

cards.name: Slip+
cards.description:
Gain 13 Evade.
Discard 1 card.
Add 1 Stumble into your hand.

cards.name: Spinning Strike
cards.description: Deal 8 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Spinning Strike+
cards.description: Deal 11 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Stalk
cards.description: Gain Block equal to 5 times the number of debuffs ALL enemies have.

cards.name: Stalk+
cards.description: Gain Block equal to 5 times the number of debuffs ALL enemies have, plus 4 Block.

cards.name: Train Wreck
cards.description:
ALL enemies lose 6 Strength this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Train Wreck+
cards.description:
ALL enemies lose 8 Strength this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Trip Lunge
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Add 1 Stumble into your hand.

cards.name: Trip Lunge+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Add 1 Stumble into your hand.

cards.name: Two-Step
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Next turn, gain 7 Evade.

cards.name: Two-Step+
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Next turn, gain 10 Evade.

cards.name: Accidental Slap
cards.description: Deal damage equal to 1 times the number of cards discarded this combat.

cards.name: Accidental Slap+
cards.description: Deal damage equal to 2 times the number of cards discarded this combat.

cards.name: All In
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage.
If the enemy intends to attack, apply 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: All In+
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage.
If the enemy intends to attack, apply 3 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Blood Bath
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage.
If this kills an enemy, deal 20 damage again to a random enemy.

cards.name: Blood Bath+
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage.
If this kills an enemy, deal 25 damage again to a random enemy.

cards.name: Blood Scent
cards.description:
Gain 3 Strength.
Lose all Block.
Lose all Evade.

cards.name: Blood Scent+
cards.description:
Gain 4 Strength.
Lose all Block.
Lose all Evade.

cards.name: Body Blow
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.
Discard 1 card at random.

cards.name: Body Blow+
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage to ALL enemies.
Discard 1 card at random.

cards.name: Counterattack
cards.description: Whenever you gain Evade, deal 1 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Counterattack+
cards.description: Whenever you gain Evade, deal 2 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Defensive Stance
cards.description:
Gain 4 Evade.
Permanently increase this card's Evade by 2.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Defensive Stance+
cards.description:
Gain 4 Evade.
Permanently increase this card's Evade by 3.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Extreme Speed
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
If you have at least 3 Evade, lose 3 Evade and draw a card.

cards.name: Extreme Speed+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
If you have at least 2 Evade, lose 2 Evade and draw a card.

cards.name: Finishing Move
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Deal 20 damage.
If the enemy has less than 50 %HP, deal 30 damage instead.

cards.name: Finishing Move+
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Deal 25 damage.
If the enemy has less than 60 %HP, deal 35 damage instead.

cards.name: Focused Strike
cards.description: Deal 7 Damage. If you have Evade, gain 1 [E].

cards.name: Focused Strike+
cards.description: Deal 10 Damage. If you have Evade, gain 1 [E].

cards.name: Fumbling Blow
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Draw a card.
Clumsy: Deal 4 damage.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Fumbling Blow+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Draw a card.
Clumsy: Deal 7 damage.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Goddess Of Misfortune
cards.description: At the start of your turn, add 1 Stumble into your hand.

cards.name: Goddess Of Misfortune+
cards.description:
Innate.
At the start of your turn, add 1 Stumble into your hand.

cards.name: Piling Errors
cards.description: All Stumbles have Retain.

cards.name: Piling Errors+
cards.description:
All Stumbles Retain.
Stumbles can now be played for 1 [E]. Whenever you play a Stumble, Exhaust it.

cards.name: Prepared
cards.description: This turn, your next Skill is played twice.

cards.name: Prepared+
cards.description: This turn, your next 2 Skills are played twice.

cards.name: Scratch Flurry
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Draw 3 cards and discard all cards drawn this way that are not claws.

cards.name: Scratch Flurry+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Draw 3 cards and discard all cards drawn this way that are not claws.

cards.name: Shocked Witness
cards.description: The first time you Exhaust a card during your turn, apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Shocked Witness+
cards.description: The first time you Exhaust a card during your turn, apply 2 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Smell Fear
cards.description: If the target does not intend to Attack, gain 2 Strength.

cards.name: Smell Fear+
cards.description: If the target does not intend to Attack, gain 3 Strength.

cards.name: That Wasn't It
cards.description:
Place a card from your Exhaust pile into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: That Wasn't It+
cards.description:
Place a card from your Exhaust pile into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Trying My Best
cards.description:
Discard your hand.
Deal 12 for every Attack and Stumble discarded this way.

cards.name: Trying My Best+
cards.description:
Discard your hand.
Deal 15 for every Attack and Stumble discarded this way.

cards.name: Unrelenting Assault
cards.description:
Draw 6 cards.
Deal 8 damage for each Attack drawn this way.

cards.name: Unrelenting Assault+
cards.description:
Draw 6 cards.
Deal 12 damage for each Attack drawn this way.

cards.name: Accidental Headbutt
cards.description:
Stuns the enemy and ends your turn. Gain 1 Intangible.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Accidental Headbutt+
cards.description:
Stuns the enemy and ends your turn. Gain 1 Intangible.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Adaptive Pacing
cards.description:
Gain 15 Block.
Reduce this card's cost by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Adaptive Pacing+
cards.description:
Gain 20 Block.
Reduce this card's cost by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Adventurer's Insight
cards.description: Whenever you would gain Evade, gain 1 more.

cards.name: Adventurer's Insight+
cards.description:
Innate.
Whenever you would gain Evade, gain 1 more.

cards.name: Angry Form
cards.description:
Evade will increase your damage by 2 times the Evade amount.
Evade will not increase Block anymore.

cards.name: Angry Form+
cards.description:
Innate.
Evade will increase your damage by 2 times the Evade amount.
Evade will not increase Block anymore.

cards.name: Beastification
cards.description:
Gain 3 Strength.
Gain 3 Dexterity.
Gain 15 Block.
Next turn, lose [E] [E].

cards.name: Beastification+
cards.description:
Gain 4 Strength.
Gain 4 Dexterity.
Gain 15 Block.
Next turn, lose [E] [E].

cards.name: Bleeding Wounds
cards.description: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply 1 Poison.

cards.name: Bleeding Wounds+
cards.description: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply 1 Poison.

cards.name: Bloody Claws
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage to a random enemy 3 times.
Heal HP equal to unblocked damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bloody Claws+
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage to a random enemy 4 times.
Heal HP equal to unblocked damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Enrage
cards.description: At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to a random enemy for each Attack played this turn.

cards.name: Enrage+
cards.description: At the end of your turn, deal 5 damage to a random enemy for each Attack played this turn.

cards.name: Howl
cards.description:
Double your Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Howl+
cards.description: Double your Strength.

cards.name: Hunger Claw
cards.description:
Deal 18 damage to the enemy with the most stacks of Gash.
If this kills a non-minion enemy, raise your Max HP by 3.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hunger Claw+
cards.description:
Deal 18 damage to the enemy with the most stacks of Gash.
If this kills a non-minion enemy, raise your Max HP by 4.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Insane
cards.description:
Fetch all cards from exhaust pile, they cost 1 this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Insane+
cards.description:
Fetch all cards from exhaust pile, they cost 0 this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Learn The Pattern
cards.description:
Double your Evade.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Learn The Pattern+
cards.description: Double your Evade.

cards.name: Never Giving Up
cards.description: Whenever you discard a card, deals 3 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Never Giving Up+
cards.description:
Innate.
Whenever you discard a card, deals 3 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Perfect Block
cards.description: Gain 6 Block.

cards.name: Perfect Block+
cards.description: Gain 10 Block.

cards.name: Poise Stance
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain 2 Evade.

cards.name: Poise Stance+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain 4 Evade.

cards.name: Seven Lives
cards.description:
Ignore the next attack that would deal damage to you, gain that much Evade instead.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Seven Lives+
cards.description:
Ignore the next 2 attacks that would deal damage to you, gain that much Evade instead. Multi-hits attacks are counted as a single attack, but will remove multiple stacks.
Exhaust.

relics.name: Trained
relics.description: Whenever you attack an enemy that intends to attack, gain 1 Evade.
relics.flavorText: An adventurer is always able to exploit opportunities.

relics.name: Dried Fish
relics.description: Every time you play 10 Attacks, heal 2.
relics.flavorText: The perfect snack for a long adventure.

relics.name: Lost and Found
relics.description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, gain 2 Evade.

relics.name: Ambush
relics.description: At the start of the combat, remove 1 Artifact from enemies.
relics.flavorText: I've never heard a monster yelling 'unfair'.

relics.name: Throwing Dagger
relics.description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 4 Evade.
relics.flavorText: Any seasoned adventurer knows a trick or two.

relics.name: Monster Guide
relics.description: The first time you would gain a debuff in each combat, reflect it.
relics.flavorText: Contains detailed information about every monster.

relics.name: Nepeta's Hat
relics.description: Whenever you attack an enemy that has Block, remove 2 of their Block and apply 2 Poison.
relics.flavorText: It smells like sugar and tea...

relics.name: Adventurer's Tag
relics.description: Whenever you are attacked, gain 4 Evade.
relics.flavorText: A tag with your name made with a fantastical metal.

relics.name: Beginner's Luck
relics.description:
Replaces Trained. Start each turn with 3 stacks.
Whenever you discard a card, lose one stack and draw a card.

relics.name: Instincts
relics.description: Replaces Trained. At the start of combat, gain 3 Strength, lose 1 Strength at the end of your first turn.

keywords.name: Clumsy
keywords.description: Triggers when you discard or exhaust this card.

keywords.name: Evade
keywords.description: Spends all Evade to increase your next Block. Lose half stacks at the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Gash
keywords.description: Increases the damage done by Claw cards.

keywords.name: Keyword
keywords.description: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.

keywords.name: Striken
keywords.description: Increases the damage done by Strike cards.

keywords.name: Stumble
keywords.description: Stumbles are unplayable status cards that deal damage when discarded or exhausted (Clumsy).
